Access to health is a fundamental point. #DimanchePlus # FH2012
DSK is not in the campaign, it does not have to come back, in any way. #DimanchePlus # FH2012
Dear friends, follow our big gathering live at #Bercy in a few moments! http://t.co/lurk4x7A # FH2012
Find from 14 hours Sanseverino, Neg'Marrons, Pep's and Yael Naim on the stage of #Bercy live here: http://t.co/lurk4x7A # FH2012
Dear friends, I will be on the stage of #Bercy in a few moments! Follow my speech live: http://t.co/lurk4x7A # FH2012
We had been waiting for change for years! He is here, he is coming! #Bercy
In a week, day to day, hour to hour, our fellow citizens will be deciding whether to continue or change! #Bercy
You put me in the lead with a result that no socialist had so far obtained! #Bercy
We did better than in the first round of 1981! #Bercy
Nothing is certain, we must not yield to the euphoria of moods, we must seek victory, be worthy, be proud of it! #Bercy
Even today, I want to remove doubts, mobilize energies, give meaning to what we do together! #Bercy
I want to be the affirmation of a hope, a project, a will! #Bercy
We have to turn the page of a quinquennium of failure, and open together a new page of History! #Bercy
We have to gain trust. This word, trust, which is the most beautiful of the Republic! #Bercy
I want to reconnect with the French dream! #Bercy
France has not accomplished on the fear of the other! # FH2012
France is great when it carries a universal message, of surpassing, elevation! #Bercy
It is patriotism that I oppose to nationalism. #Bercy
Patriotism is loving oneself to love others! #Bercy
For months, the European peoples have been looking towards France! #Bercy
They are waiting for us, we are coming! #Bercy
#Montenegro becomes full #WTO member today
I wanted to address the best in all of us! #Bercy
I refused to flatter mediocre sentiments, to practice overbidding! #Bercy
I am the heir of a social model erected by French resistance fighters! #Bercy
It would be useless to promise if it was to deny afterwards! #Bercy
Our duty is to give pride and honor to politics! #Bercy
Thank you @ Melenchon2012, thank you @EvaJoly, thank you to the left to be the appointment of the alternation, the rendezvous of victory! #Bercy
I want to address those who, beyond political sensitivities, are concerned about social cohesion! #Bercy
I want to win back men and women angry, a thousand times yes! But to promise to compromise, a thousand times no! #Bercy
The first duty of a President is to solve problems and not to create others. #Bercy
The duty of a President is to gather and not to divide! #Bercy
The problems of our country will not disappear with the candidate-outgoing, it would be too simple! #Bercy
I do not want to hide anything about the difficulties that lie ahead, but I want the French to regain a taste for trust! #Bercy
A beautiful victory is the one that speaks the truth and prepares the action. #Bercy
It's always the same fear that the right installs! But it's actually his fear: his fear of leaving the power, to leave the place! #Bercy
There are no two France that would confront each other. No, there is only France, France that will speak May 6! #Bercy
I do not accept that religions are instrumentalized in the public debate! #Bercy
I demand the application of the strict principle of secularism throughout the country! #Bercy
I do not see appearances, I see only belongings to the Republic! #Bercy
I do not do politics through religions! #Bercy
The stakes of the election are first and foremost economic and social issues. The first concerns are employment and housing! #Bercy
May 1st, respect for the trade unions! # 1ermai #Bercy
Employment must be the first priority! This is the meaning of my proposal on the generation contract! http://t.co/doCx8a0O #Bercy
We will have to support businesses! #Bercy
We will set rules for competition: the rule of reciprocity! #Bercy
I will send a memorandum to all European governments to initiate the renegotiation of the treaty! #Bercy
The School of the Republic will be the budget priority of the next quinquennium! #Bercy
What do we want: to protect the wealthy or the children of the Republic? I chose and the French will choose too! #Bercy
There will be so many inequalities to fight! The public hospital must be considered as a public service, no longer as a business! #Bercy

Being the head of state presupposes having a conception of the state. Mine is the exemplary. #Bercy
I want to return the state to the citizens. For 5 years, the head of state has been so present and the state so absent! #Bercy
The state is the only good of those who do not have one! #Bercy
The head of state must not be the head of everything, responsible for nothing! #Bercy
Our campaign was voluntary, dignified, fraternal, unifying. #Bercy
I want the next President of the Republic to be voluntary, dignified, fraternal and unifying! #Bercy
I want to end with arrogance, with privileges, with brutality, with injustices! #Bercy
It's not just about beating the right, it's about giving France confidence in it! #Bercy
We believe in the Republic one and indivisible! We believe in justice! #Bercy
We believe in a France that gives young people all their chances! #Bercy
What we have to do more beautiful is not to discard but to choose! #Bercy
The victory I'm waiting for, who's here, I want it to be a happiness for everyone! #Bercy
I want the French to resume the good march of progress! #Bercy
I want France to say to herself, when she makes the choice of her destiny, that nobody will stay away! #Bercy
I want the holiday, so festive there is, May 6, be the feast of the whole Republic! #Bercy
Thank you because without you, there is no victory possible! #Bercy
Thank you to everyone who came today to #Bercy! Nothing will stop the change that happens! http://t.co/ECnUPueS
